PSCT.Base: This card's name becomes "Armed Dragon LV7" while on the field or in the GY. You can only use each of the following effects of "Armed Dragon Thunder LV7" once per turn. You can send 1 monster from your hand to the GY; send this card from the field to the GY, and if you do, Special Summon 1 Level 10 or lower "Armed Dragon" monster from your hand or Deck. If this card is sent to the GY to activate a Dragon monster's effect: You can add 1 "Armed Dragon" card from your Deck to your hand.
